testcase.classname: Verify successful login for Atheer user
testcase.name: Open browser and navigate to login page

testcase.classname: Verify successful login for Atheer user
testcase.name: Entering valid email address and password of admin user
testcase.system-out: Given Click on the "EMAIL_FIELD" of "loginPage".............................passed Then Enter email of admin user in "EMAIL_FIELD" field of "loginPage"........passed Then Wait for 2 seconds.....................................................passed Then Enter password of admin in "PASSWORD_FIELD" field of "loginPage".......passed Then Click on the "LOGIN_BUTTON" of "loginPage".............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify successful login for Atheer user
testcase.name: Quit the browser
